name: prometheus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in Greek mythology (= ancient stories), a demigod (= someone who is part human and part god) who stole fire from Mount Olympus: Prometheus was a Titan, the class of immortals who were around long before Zeus. Some believe that it is the mountain to which Prometheus was eternally chained.
More examplesFewer examplesPrometheus dared to steal fire from the Gods. Oceanus tells Prometheus he should keep his mouth shut and stop rocking the boat.But Prometheus , who can divine the future, has a trump.
